snippet.title: Twinsen's Little Big Adventure Classic Trailer
snippet.description:
A Little Big Adventure

Originally released in 1994 as Little Big Adventure and Relentless: Twinsen’s Adventure, Twinsen’s Little Big Adventure Classic is a cult action-adventure game on PC and PlayStation.

You play as Twinsen, a young Quetch living on Citadel Island on a planet that orbits between two suns: Twinsun. The dictator Dr. FunFrock uses cloning technology and teleportation to rule with an iron fist. Twinsen is been having strange dreams in which the planet is about to be destroyed! Only the Heir of Sendell, the planet’s beloved Goddess, can prevent this from happening.

Dr. FunFrock forbids everyone to even talk about Sendell’s Legend, so he locks Twinsen up in an asylum. Twinsen needs to escape to stop FunFrock, uncover his magical ancestry, protect the planet's secrets and meet his destiny.

Play Twinsen's Little Big Adventure Classic
Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/397330/Twinsens_Little_Big_Adventure_Classic 
GoG : https://www.gog.com/game/little_big_adventure
itch.io : https://2-point-21.itch.io/little-big-adventure-twinsen-adventure
